headline: Consumer Tech News (Feb 23-27): US–Taiwan Trade Tensions Escalates, Amazon Invests $12B In US & More
summary: Mark Kelly emphasized the rapid workplace impact of artificial intelligence and called for "practical rules" that protect families while preserving innovation. U.S.–Taiwan trade tensions escalated after the Supreme Court struck down former President Donald Trump's emergency tariff authority. Trump responded by criticizing Taiwan's semiconductor dominance and proposing new tariffs.

headline: Super Micro Links High Density AI Servers With Grid Responsive Data Centers
summary: Super Micro Computer (NasdaqGS: SMCI) has launched a high density AI focused MicroBlade server platform powered by AMD EPYC 4005 processors for cloud and edge workloads. In addition, the company ran a live grid integrated AI trial with CPower Energy and Bentaus, showing its servers responding to real time electricity demand signals. Taken together, these updates link SMCI's hardware roadmap with practical use cases in energy flexible data center operations. At a share price of $32.39, Super...

headline: 7 "Rules" to Improve Your Stock Investing in 2026 and Beyond: Using Nvidia, Palantir, Netflix, Peloton, and Super Micro Computer Stocks as Examples
summary: If you're willing to put in the effort to continuously improve your investing, you have a good shot at beating the market over the long term.
